article_title: Prosperity gospel televangelist Paul Crouch dead at 79
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

(RNS) Paul Crouch, the religious broadcaster who co-founded Trinity Broadcasting Network and was known for his prosperity gospel messages and lavish lifestyle, died Saturday (Nov. 30). He was 79.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Beliefs, Assemblies of God, Christian, Ole Anthony, Pat Robertson, Paul Crouch, Pentecostal, Trinity Broadcasting Network
